app_name: Groups Treatment Groups Apple Translate GrandTranslate
app_description: Grand Translate is your trusted assistant in global language communication. This powerful translation tool not only supports text translation but also provides advanced photo translation features allowing you to communicate easily in any language. Core features: Text Translation: with a wide range of language support Grand Translate ensures that you are comfortable with text translation for study travel or business. Real time accurate translation services provide you with a seamless language experience. Photo Translation: Utilizing advanced photo translation technology Grand Translate allows you to type in text without the hassle simply take a picture of the target text and get the translation result instantly. This feature allows you to easily understand unfamiliar languages and realize true language accessibility. Supports 25 languages: English German Italian French Hindi Romanian Japanese Chinese Korean Thai Portuguese Greek Bulgarian Finnish Slovenian Arabic Dutch Estonian Swedish Vietnamese Spanish Russian Polish Danish Hungarian
